lead_paragraph: Acerbic comedian Joan Rivers died in New York on Thursday, a week after suffering cardiac arrest during a medical procedure on her vocal cords, her daughter Melissa Rivers said.

headline.main: Stars, Others React to Death of Joan Rivers
headline.print_headline: Stars, Others React to Death of Joan Rivers

snippet: Acerbic comedian Joan Rivers died in New York on Thursday, a week after suffering cardiac arrest during a medical procedure on her vocal cords, her daughter Melissa Rivers said....
